university.title: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
university.subtitle: BSc Quantitative Finance and Computer Science (QFIN & COSC)

actions: Prototyped a machine learning based intra-day alpha model using intra-day price-volume data
Performed technical analysis on commodity futures of the mainland China market
Automated market data collection processes in Python, reduced 3 man-hours of work per day
Created automatic trading scripts in Python connecting to the Interactive Brokers TWS API
Evaluated features generated with machine learning models (tree model, neural network, etc.)
Built an event-driven, OO backtest system for algorithmic trading projects in Python
Conducted classification and sentiment analysis with CNN and LSTM networks
Coordinated and allocated work for all interns
Automated operation processes in Python and JavaScript, reduced 200 man-hours of manual work
Performed fund classification and clustering with machine learning methods
Organised the Annual Sports Day for the department
Maintained connection with corresponding departments of HKUST
